entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @VP President Obama built it starting in ‘09 after Bush fucked it up. You rode President Obama’s coat tails for 3 years, then you screwed the pooch with your Covid-19 denials. We’re where we are because you’re an idiot.
